description.en:
In the 2300s AD, a new continent suddenly appeared in the middle of the Pacific Ocean . Governments around the world named this continent "Lebibania" and made it a destination for the over-grown population due to the unstoppable population explosion, but as a result, the people who crossed over to this new continent were criminals who committed serious crimes . I didn't. Therefore, governments around the world prohibited not only firearms and all other weapons, but also the introduction of modern science and technology to prevent further serious crimes. However, even in such an environment, there were constant fights between serious criminals, and martial arts developed abnormally as a means of fighting. Meanwhile, the continents other than Levivania will be completely destroyed in 300 years due to world wars, natural disasters, etc. Ironically, in Levivania, the only place where humans can survive, it has become an era of the law of the law, where the strong and strong can survive.

The year is 2600, the continent of Levivania.

Kaito Muten is the supreme successor of the Mutengan style and controls blood waves.

Mana, a female martial artist who manipulates the bite dragon palm.

15 years after his birth, Kaito went down the mountain and went to town after training in the mountains with his grandfather. Kite gets excited when he sees many people other than his grandfather for the first time. However, the city was about to be ruled by a rogue named Smobros. The people of the city hire a bodyguard Mana to counter this, but there is no turn for Mana and Smobros is repelled by Kaito's success.

That night, at a drinking party praising Kaito, Mana loses her sense of existence and is uninterested in it. He confronts Kaito that he can't be manipulated like a thug.

It seemed that the fight was evenly contested, but...
